name: Yaoi Beast Boys
summary:
Jackson was just your everyday businessman.. until a strange sickness spreads in his town that turns people part animal and gives them an uncontrollable sexual desire!

One day, a man named Alex passes out in front of Jackson and he springs into action, saving him by performing mouth-to-mouth resuscitation. An ambulance arrives on the scene and the man is saved, but Jackson can’t help but shake the strange feeling in his body…

That night, with a full moon in the sky, Jackson turns into a werewolf… and he can’t control his desire! Before he realizes it, he kisses his best friend Ian. When he comes back to his senses, Alex appears before him and tells him there’s a way to suppress his desires… But Alex tells him that to get the medicine, he must kiss him every night of the full moon!
